attributes.action: Fund more money to the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: If more money is simply given to the NHS, this can save more lives and take some stress from the NHS and especially it’s vital doctors and nurses. They spend long and hard ours making sure that the patients in their care have the treatment they need.
attributes.background: NHS staff are under payed. Thousands are on long waiting lists for life-saving surgeries, etc. There are not enough beds for both Covid/general patients and there are not enough nurses or doctors because they aren’t payed enough for the long hours they do or the amazing work they put in daily.
